thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 06 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Appscatter Group Announces Proposed Acquisition Of Priori Data GmbH

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Appscatter Group Announces Proposed Acquisition Of Priori Data GmbH

organizations.name: brief-appscatter group announces proposed acquisition of priori data gmbh

text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Appscatter Group PLC:
* PROPOSED ACQUISITION BY CO OF PRIORI DATA GMBH (PRIORI), A B2B SAAS PLATFORM PROVIDER OF MOBILE APP INTELLIGENCE
* ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT FOR ACQUISITION OF 100 PERCENT OF PRIORI FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION PAYABLE ON COMPLETION OF £13.5 MILLION​
* ‍REPORTS THAT TRADING FOR YEAR TO 31 DECEMBER 2017 REMAINS IN LINE WITH MARKET EXPECTATIONS​
* EXPECTS TO REPORT FY 2017 REVENUES OF ABOUT £1.9 MILLION AND A LOSS BEFORE INTEREST AND TAX OF APPROXIMATELY £6.5 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
